amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 112-173 to prevent use of funds to distribute printed copies of the Congressional Record to Member offices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Paulsen.
